DOC.brief_summary: This study assess long-term safety tolerability 350 600 mg/day PD 0332334 administer split dose ( twice daily ) subject Generalized Anxiety Disorder .
DOC.brief_title: A 52-Week Open-Label Safety Study PD 0332334 Subjects With Generalized Anxiety Disorder ( GAD )
DOC.detailed_description: Termination reason : On February 23rd 2009 , decision terminate development PD 0332334 communicate investigator study . The decision terminate study base safety concern .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must complete phase one four precede doubleblind GAD study . Female must continue use adequate birth control method negative serum pregnancy test within 14 day prior start open label treatment . Subjects experience serious adverse event precede doubleblind efficacy study judge related study medication investigator sponsor 's medical monitor . Individuals ongoing , unresolved , clinically significant medical problem , judgment investigator sponsor 's medical monitor , would make unsafe subject participate study . Serious suicidal risk per clinical investigator 's judgement .
